keyMappings:
# Insert your preferred key mappings here.
unmapAll
map j scrollDown
map k scrollUp
map gg scrollToTop
map G scrollToBottom
map h scrollLeft
map l scrollRight
map r reload
map R reload hard
map yy copyCurrentUrl
map pp openCopiedUrlInCurrentTab
map pP openCopiedUrlInNewTab
map gu goUp
map gU goToRoot
map i enterInsertMode
map v enterVisualMode
map V enterVisualLineMode
map gi focusInput
map ;o LinkHints.activateMode
map ;t LinkHints.activateModeToOpenInNewTab
map ;b LinkHints.activateModeWithQueue
map ;y LinkHints.activateModeToCopyLinkUrl
map [[ goPrevious
map ]] goNext
map m Marks.activateCreateMode
map ' Marks.activateGotoMode
map ` Marks.activateGotoMode
map o Vomnibar.activate
map t Vomnibar.activateInNewTab
map b Vomnibar.activateTabSelection
map O Vomnibar.activateEditUrl
map / enterFindMode
map n performFind
map N performBackwardsFind
map H goBack
map L goForward
map K previousTab
map J nextTab
map <c-6> visitPreviousTab
map g0 firstTab
map g^ firstTab
map g$ lastTab
map d removeTab
map u restoreTab
map << moveTabLeft
map >> moveTabRight
map ? showHelp
map gs toggleViewSource
searchEngines:
w: https://www.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Special:Search&search=%s Wikipedia
g: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s Google
y: https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=%s Youtube
b: https://www.bing.com/search?q=%s Bing
a: https://smile.amazon.com/s/?field-keywords=%s Amazon
